title: The Bootstrapper's Bible Manifesto by Seth Godin
description:
PDF, 103 pages

revision 6.01 from 15 Nov 2004


Seth Godin wrote near the beginning:

"This manifesto is based on The Bootstrapper’s Bible, a book I wrote a few years ago. What I’ve done is divided it into short sections, so you can find the little kernel of insight you need, when you need it.

You can use the information in this manifesto to make any company more focused, more efficient, and more grassroots. Throughout this manifesto, though, Iʼll be primarily addressing the classic bootstrapper: entrepreneurs who are working their butts off to start a great business from scratch with no (or almost no) money."

parsed.dn: The Bootstrapper's Bible Manifesto by Seth Godin
parsed.name: The Bootstrapper's Bible Manifesto by Seth Godin
